title: panic when preparing tpcc/ch benchmark dataset
body: ## Bug Report when doing ``` go-tpc tpcc cleanup -H 127.0.0.1 -P 4001 --warehouses 1 -D ch ``` and ``` go-tpc ch cleanup -H 127.0.0.1 -P 4001 --warehouses 1 -D ch ``` sometimes tikv will panic ``` tikv quit: exit status 1 [2021/11/09 11:43:14.772 +08:00] [INFO] [raft.rs:1200] ["became leader at term 6"] [term=6] [raft_id=80] [region_id=79] [2021/11/09 11:43:14.772 +08:00] [INFO] TiKV are you using? 5.2.1 ### What operating system and CPU are you using? ubuntu ``` processor : 5 vendor_id : GenuineIntel cpu family : 6 model : 158 model name : Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-9400F CPU @ comments_data.body: It seems to be duplicated with https://github.com/tikv/tikv/issues/11192
